name: Miserable Morene and the Raiders of the Gold Blum
name_original: Miserable Morene and the Raiders of the Gold Blum
description:
Hello all!

Miserable Morene is a collaboration project between me and a couple friends from work for the Ludum Dare 43 Game Jam. I hope you like it, feel free to leave me feedback in the comments section or on my Ludum Dare jam page.

Thank you very much,

- Izunah
